lines.speaker: Wife
text: There was nothing you could have done.

lines.speaker: Hero
text: I need to carry on without you

lines.speaker: Wife
text: Those are the words I have waited for this whole time.
End this cycle. Be free of this cage.

lines.speaker: Hero
text: I'm glad you have found peace.

lines.speaker: Wife
text: As my final gift, accept the overdrive Cartridge Change.
With it, you can refresh all your abilities to your heart's content!
Practice it once with me before you go.
